title: Prices added FS old mill Johnson w/ glove & other HOF
author: stewbacca

posts.post_title: Prices added FS old mill Johnson w/ glove & other HOF
posts.post_content:
All of these cards are in my museum...I mean on eBay, but bigger discounts on this site since my fees will be zero.  Prices added and shipping is on me. 
All are raw
Johnson glove showing Old Mill  $650
Lajoie throwing skinned back was in a PSA authentic holder $85
Tris Speaker Sweet Cap 350 missing bottom left corner $135
Baker Piedmont 350 was in a SGC 10  $55
Duffy Sweet Cap 350-460 was in a mislabeled SGC 20(label says Piedmont) $55
McGraw finger in air Piedmont 350 has writing on back  $30
Bender w trees SC 350 paper loss on back $45
McGraw mitt on hip PB lots of creases $35
McGraw portrait no hat SC 350 paper loss on back $40
Marquand throwing P 350-460 trimmed bottom one big crease across the card $110
Evers with bad Cubs skinned back $50

If they already have a bid, then I need to let the eBay auction play out.

eBay name :  plbstew

Thanks,
Paul
Man, you made my heart stop thinking you had a WaJo Old Mill portrait.  You can't be doing that to a guy! :eek:
sorry, my bad, glove showing.  Let me fix that before any more heart attacks!!!
Friendly bump for actually trying to sell something
